description: Unjoin the secure NFS server from the NAS server's Active Directory domain. If you unjoin with secure NFS exports active, exports will be unavailable to the clients.

domain_password.description: Password of the domain-user specified to unjoin from the Active Directory domain.

domain_user_name.description: Name of a domain-user with privileges to unjoin from the Active Directory domain.

id.description: Unique identifier of the NFS server.
